docs.lead_paragraph: Researchers at Columbia University have demonstrated experimentally in animals how smoking during pregnancy can harm unborn babies.

headline.main: Columbia Researchers Say Smoking During Pregnancy Harms Fetus

docs.abstract: Columbia Univ research team repts 2 yrs of lab tests with pregnant Rhesus monkeys show mothers who smoke during pregnancy risk harming unborn babies; experiments described; recent statistical studies on effects on women smoking during pregnancy discussed
docs.snippet: Researchers at Columbia University have demonstrated experimentally in animals how smoking during pregnancy can harm unborn babies.
